title: Sunshine Coast Self-Contained Two-Bedroom Apartments near Alexandra Headland Beach & Mooloolaba Esplanade
description:
Combining home-away-from-home conveniences with tranquil beachfront living, this is the perfect laidback escape, located opposite Alexandra Headland Beach. Golden shores, crystal-clear waters and trendy cafes are just a few reasons why the Sunshine Coast is adored as one of Australiaâ€™s most beloved coastal cities, and this resort offers direct access to the region's best, including the bustling Mooloolaba Esplanade and all-day dining favourite Alex Surf Club.

For those seeking adventure, SEA LIFE Sunshine Coast Aquarium is within a 10-minute drive, while the famed Australia Zoo is just 30 minutes away. Return to plenty of family-friendly fun, including a heated pool (with spa and sauna), tennis court and mini-golf course.
offer_address: 174 Alexandra Parade, Alexandra Headland, Queensland 4572, Australia

title: Coastal Mooloolaba Family Resort with 150m Lagoon Pool and Waterslide
description: Experience the sun-kissed charm of the Sunshine Coast with a stay at this family retreat, offering direct access to the golden sands of Alexandra Headland Beach, with Mooloolaba's vibrant dining scene just a short stroll away. Bring the whole family along on your QLD adventure, splashing around in the 150m tropical lagoon pool, sliding down the waterslide or swinging about on the playground. Venture further afar to explore the Underwater World Sea Life Aquarium or take a scenic half-hour drive to the world-renowned Australia Zoo.
offer_address: 180 Alexandra Parade, Alexandra Headlands, Queensland 4572, Australia
